Using Euler equation to estimate non-finite-dependent dynamic discrete choice model with unobserved heterogeneity

Jasmine Hao and Hiro Kasahara

Following the method in Aguirregabiria and Magesan(2016), I redefine the decision problem for non-finite-dependent models in the probability space and derived the optimal decision rule condition.

View Detail

Testing the number of components in finite mixture model with normal panel regression

Based on Joint Project with Professor Hiro Kasahara

This paper develops the likelihood-ratio based test of the null hypothesis of a $m_0$-component model against an alternative of $(m_0+1)$-component model in the normal mixture panel regression.
